timeline.message: Removed ‘cadence’ from variables and strings in java code.
Replaced 'Cadence' in comments throughout Java code.

timeline.bodyText: Check with @alexshtin . I'm surprised that it works with Thrift API of the temporal service (unless it was renamed on the server side as well.)
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText: Yes, it is still cadence-frontend there. I wouldn't rename it because it will be gone after gRPC migration.
replies.author: alexshtin

timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText: Is "uber" supposed to become "temporal" here as well?
replies.author: vkoby

replies.bodyText: Yes, I believe it is OK. Check with @alexshtin to see if this string is hardcoded anywhere in the service code.
replies.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText: Actually they are. Let's leave it as is and file an issue to rename them later altogether.
replies.author: alexshtin

timeline.bodyText: Revert as the issue is still in the cadence repo.
timeline.author: mfateev

timeline.message: Currently still 'cadence' in temporal service. Will file a separate ticket to rename them together.

Currently the jar contains source code intead of binaries, because after it'screated it's overwritten twice (first with javadoc, then with source code). Changed to create 3 separate jars for each type.
